roleset.name: record an image of (using mri, x-ray, cat scan, ultrasound, etc.)

role.descr: more specific entity imaged, if in addition to ARG1

example.name: imaging-n
example.text: It 's the same phenomenon used in the new MRI -LRB- magnetic resonance imaging -RRB- scanners being used in hospitals in place of X - ray scans .

example.name: image-v: Arg1 as anatomical part
example.text: The patient 's chest is to be imaged .

example.name: imaging-n
example.text: Dr. Helton 's imaging of the patient 's elbow allowed them to check for fractures .

example.name: imaging-nnon-medical cryo example
example.text: The imaging of the sea - ice surface during the cruise .

example.name: imaging-n
example.text: September 2005 - Imaging showed two liver lesions .
example.amr: (s / show-01 :ARG0 (i2 / image-101) :ARG1 (s2 / sign-symptom :quant 2 :name (n / name :op1 "lesion") :location (a / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "liver"))) :time (d / date-entity :month 9 :year 2005))

roleset.note: IMAGE NOTES: Arg2-'more specific entity imaged' added for THYME, 2021
IMAGE-V NOTES: Based on data in medical QA corpus (Framed by Anwen 07/20/10) (from image.101-v)
IMAGING-N NOTES: Corresponds with image.101. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from imaging.01-n)
